abstract: Verizon will pay as much as $200 million to avoid a possible patent-related ban on handsets using Qualcomm chips.
snippet: Verizon will pay as much as $200 million to avoid a possible patent-related ban on handsets using Qualcomm chips.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Wireless will pay the Broadcom Corporation as much as $200 million to bypass a possible ban on some handsets that use Qualcomm chips.

headline.main: Verizon Wireless and Broadcom in Deal
headline.print_headline: Verizon Wireless and Broadcom in Deal
